# This file doesn't do anything yet, but it's reserved for future external dependencies

# include(FetchContent)
# 
# FetchContent_Declare(
#     some_library
#     GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/user/some_library.git
#     GIT_TAG main
# )
# FetchContent_MakeAvailable(some_library)
# 
# target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME}_lib PUBLIC some_library)
